item.description:
Conscious Evolution:
Reflections of a Master's Program

SOLO ART EXHIBITION
by Amy Mielke




This exhibit is the result of two years of study in the Conscious Evolution Master of Arts program at The Graduate Institute. Amy Mielke created "reflection artwork" after each cohort meeting during the twenty-two month program. These spontaneous works are based on key ideas that resonated with the artist. This exhibit also includes a 7-year retrospective of the artist's work.

Opening Reception: Saturday, February 5, 2011, 5-8 pm


MUSICAL PERFORMANCE by:
Todd Merrell (electronics), Matt Sargent (laptop/guitars), and Stephen Haynes (trumpet) from the Hartford Sound Alliance. The three Hartford-based musicians will be performing a variety of impromptu sonic textures and improvisations.

KOMBUCHA tasting provided by Katalyst Kombucha.

Admission is free.
Hartford ArtSpace Gallery
555 Asylum Street
Hartford, CT




Life After Death by Amy Mielke
item.name: Conscious Evolution: Reflections
